languages.text: "Ты был никудышным наставником. Твоя неудача только подтвердила мои ожидания. Тебе следовало знать свое место..."

traits.locale_text: "Ты был никудышным наставником, Вайс. Твоя неудача только подтвердила мои ожидания. Глупый юнец, тебе следовало знать свое место..."

languages.text: "You were useless as a mentor. Your failure merely confirmed my expectations. You should have known your place..."
languages.original_text: "Ты был никудышным наставником. Твоя неудача только подтвердила мои ожидания. Тебе следовало знать свое место..."

traits.locale_text: "You were useless as a mentor. Your failure merely confirmed my expectations. You should have known your place..."
"You were useless as a mentor. Your failure merely confirmed my expectations. You should have known your place..."
"You were useless as a mentor. Your failure merely confirmed my expectations. You should have known your place..."
"You were useless as a mentor. Your failure merely confirmed my expectations. You should have known your place..."
"You were useless as a mentor. Your failure merely confirmed my expectations. You should have known your place..."
"You were useless as a mentor. Your failure merely confirmed my expectations. You should have known your place..."

languages.text: «Fuiste un mentor inútil. Tu fracaso no hizo más que confirmar mis expectativas. Deberías haber sabido cuál era tu lugar...».
languages.original_text: "You were useless as a mentor. Your failure merely confirmed my expectations. You should have known your place..."

traits.locale_text: «Fuiste un mentor inútil. Tu fracaso no hizo más que confirmar mis expectativas. Deberías haber sabido cuál era tu lugar...».

languages.text: 「メンターの役割を果たしていない。あなたの失敗は、単に私の予想を裏付けただけ。自分の立場を自覚しておくべきだったな…」
languages.original_text: "You were useless as a mentor. Your failure merely confirmed my expectations. You should have known your place..."

traits.locale_text: 「メンターの役割を果たしていない。あなたの失敗は、単に私の予想を裏付けただけ。自分の立場を自覚しておくべきだったな…」

languages.text: “身为导师，你简直一无是处。你的失败我毫不意外，你本该明白自己的位置才对……”
languages.original_text: "You were useless as a mentor. Your failure merely confirmed my expectations. You should have known your place..."

traits.locale_text: “身为导师，你简直一无是处。你的失败我毫不意外，你本该明白自己的位置才对……”

languages.text: "Ihr wart als Mentor nutzlos. Euer Versagen hat lediglich meine Erwartungen bestätigt. Ihr hättet Euren Platz kennen sollen ..."
languages.original_text: "You were useless as a mentor. Your failure merely confirmed my expectations. You should have known your place..."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wart als Mentor nutzlos. Euer Versagen hat lediglich meine Erwartungen bestätigt. Ihr hättet Euren Platz kennen sollen ..."

languages.text: « Vous étiez le pire des mentors. Votre échec n'a fait que le confirmer. Vous auriez dû rester à votre place... »
languages.original_text: "You were useless as a mentor. Your failure merely confirmed my expectations. You should have known your place..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous étiez le pire des mentors. Votre échec n'a fait que le confirmer. Vous auriez dû rester à votre place... »

languages.text: "Yönder olarak işe yaramazdın. Başarısızlığın beklentilerimi karşıladı. Haddini bilmen gerekirdi..."
languages.original_text: "You were useless as a mentor. Your failure merely confirmed my expectations. You should have known your place..."
